Manager Brooksource Anthem Suffolk VA Christina M Parker is a 2019 Lefcoe Leadership alumni and selected to be on the Hampton Roads Agile Leadership Team She is a Certified Scrum Master Certified SAFe management and staff management training Due to her educational background she gained skills in Health Information Project Management Agile Methodology Ecommerce SEO Web Development Cyber Security
